title: Lil Baby, Young Thug, and Future Star in New “Dum, Dumb, and Dumber”: Watch
description: The Atlantans come together for the new WHAM visual
author: Matthew Strauss
excerpt: The Atlantans come together for the new WHAM visual
text: The Atlantans come together for the new WHAM visualLil Baby, Young Thug, and Future have released the music video for their collaborative WHAM song “Dum, Dumb, and Dumber.” It’s a rare on-camera appearance for Young Thug, who’s kept a low profile since being released from jail in the autumn. (He does, however, obscure his face with a mask.) Find the new video below.Young Thug and Future are among the many artists featured on the brand-new Playboi Carti album, Music. Read about them and more in “5 Takeaways From Playboi Carti’s New Album Music.”Matthew Strauss is a Long Island native and a graduate of Columbia University. He joined Pitchfork in 2013. ... Read more
html:
The Atlantans come together for the new WHAM visual

Lil Baby, Young Thug, and Future have released the music video for their collaborative WHAM song “Dum, Dumb, and Dumber.” It’s a rare on-camera appearance for Young Thug, who’s kept a low profile since being released from jail in the autumn. (He does, however, obscure his face with a mask.) Find the new video below.

Young Thug and Future are among the many artists featured on the brand-new Playboi Carti album, Music. Read about them and more in “5 Takeaways From Playboi Carti’s New Album Music.”

Matthew Strauss is a Long Island native and a graduate of Columbia University. He joined Pitchfork in 2013. ... Read more
